metadata.title: CVE-2023-52661 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/tegra: rgb: Fix missing clk_put() in the error handling paths oftegra_dc_rgb_probe() If clk_get_sys(..., "pll_d2_out0") fails, theclk_get_sys() call must be undone. Add the missing clk_put and a new'put_pll_d_out0' label in the error handling path, and use it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
